data.html:
If you are unable to read the HTML e-mail below, please view it online .
 
 

Let the video collaboration begin
Video is becoming ubiquitous in our personal communications. So why have businesses not widely deployed?
 
 
 
 
 
   
  Follow us on
 
 
 
 Contact Avaya
(852) 3121 6109
 
 
 
 
How to Buy
 
 
 
 
Find Locations
 
 
 
 
Case Study
 
Taiwan National Fire Agency chooses Radvision to expand video network 
The new video conferencing solution offers high definition audio, video and data sharing, which helps improve agency efficiency and response time.
 
 
Avaya unified communication solutions support growth in Hong Kong International Airport 
Avaya Aura unified communications solutions have been chosen by HKIA to replace its Airport Telephone System.
 
Solutions
 
Creating conference rooms without walls using Radivison Scopia  
Avaya video conferencing removes the barriers of distance, making you more effective whether you are working from your desktop, conference room, or mobile device.
 
News Brief
 
Avaya recognized as a leader in worldwide mobile unified communications and collaboration
Industry analyst firm IDC has named Avaya a leader in the IDC Marketscape: Worldwide Mobile Unified Communications and Collaboration.
 
 
Avaya positioned as a leader in corporate telephony
Avaya has been positioned as a Leader in the recently published 2012 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Corporate Telephony.
 
 
Avaya wins Thomas Alva Edison patent award for unique method of enabling real-time collaboration
Avaya and two of its Avaya Labs researchers have won the 2012 Thomas A. Edison Award in Information Technology from the R&D Council of NJ.

data.plainText:
Usher in a prosperous New Year with lucky gifts from City of Dreams!

If you cannot read this email, please

click here(http://manggis.radicasys.com/activities/sample/viewMessage?msgid=52c25775e4b0fe3feaa3931c)

.

更改我的電子資訊語言為

繁體(http://asp1.radicaepost.com/macodat/templates/images/23/20100430_COD_May_eNews/tc_lang.html)

。

Dear $NICKNAME$

Lucky Gifts for the Year of the Dragon(http://www.cityofdreamsmacau.com/promotions/Shopping-Redemption-CNY?utm_source=nsl_1201&utm_medium=edm&utm_campaign=CNYRedemption_en)

Kung Hei Fat Choi! Embrace the festive spirit and celebrate a year of good fortune at City of Dreams! The God of Fortune will be around from 23 Jan to 5 Feb to bring luck upon all visitors. Besides, receive a set of red pockets and a pocket calendar when you spend MOP500 or more during 11 Jan to 6 Feb!

Feast on Cantonese Classics(http://www.cityofdreamsmacau.com/promotions/Restaurant-Treasure-Palace?utm_source=nsl_1201&utm_medium=edm&utm_campaign=TPCNY_en)

Celebrated Chef Tam Kwok Fung invites

you to Treasure Palace to enjoy his festive menus featuring the very best of organic ingredients and exquisite Chinese delicacies.

Auspicious Dishes for a Lucky Year(http://www.cityofdreamsmacau.com/promotions/Restaurant-Ji-Xiang-Yuan?utm_source=nsl_1201&utm_medium=edm&utm_campaign=JXYCNY_en)

Ring in a year of good fortune with traditional lucky dishes at Ji Xiang Yuan!

The Ideal New Year Gift Options(http://www.cityofdreamsmacau.com/promotions/Chinese-New-Year-Gift-Hamper?utm_source=nsl_1201&utm_medium=edm&utm_campaign=CNYHamper_en)

Share the joy with your family, friends

and business associates; choose from

City of Dreams’ luxury hampers and

New Year Pudding Gift Set.

Festive Hot Pot Buffet(http://www.cityofdreamsmacau.com/promotions/Restaurant-Wave-Hot-Pot-CNY?utm_source=nsl_1201&utm_medium=edm&utm_campaign=WaveHotpot_en)

Enjoy half a lobster all to yourself and indulge in over 50 fresh seasonal ingredients in Wave’s festive poolside hot pot!

Celebrate the Year of the Dragon withGrand Hyatt Macau(http://www.cityofdreamsmacau.com/promotions/hotel-ghm-CNY?utm_source=nsl_1201&utm_medium=edm&utm_campaign=GHMCNY_en)

A myriad of festive banqueting and celebrations has been prepared for

you this Chinese New Year.

A Holistic Spa Journey For Two(http://www.cityofdreamsmacau.com/promotions/Spa-The-Spa-at-Crown-Tower?utm_source=nsl_1201&utm_medium=edm&utm_campaign=SpaJourney_en)

Embark on a romantic spa experience at

The Spa at Crown with your loved one. Enjoy 8% off when booking between 11am-4pm, Mondays to Thursdays (excluding public holidays).

Ring in the Year of the Dragon at Kids’ City(http://www.cityofdreamsmacau.com/promotions/playground-Kids-City?utm_source=nsl_1201&utm_medium=edm&utm_campaign=KCCNY_en)

Celebrate the Year of the Dragon with your children and enjoy fun traditional Chinese activities including calligraphy, sweet dumpling making and more!

The House of Dancing Water 1st Anniversary Packages(http://www.cityofdreamsmacau.com/promotions/hotels-the-house-of-dancing-water-1st-anniversary-packages?utm_source=nsl_1201&utm_medium=edm&utm_campaign=THODW1yrpkg_en)

Hotel package including

The House of Dancing Water Tickets from just HKD1,888

Celebrate Chinese New Year with Lion Dance performance at DFS(http://www.cityofdreamsmacau.com/promotions/shopping-DFS-Chinese-New-Year?utm_source=nsl_1201&utm_medium=edm&utm_campaign=DFSCNY_en)

Celebrating the Year of Dragon with our Lion Dance performance at the Boulevard on January 25, 2012. Plus MOP300 gift certificate by using JCB credit card from now on numerous choices from luxury jewelries, watches to high fashion and beauty at DFS at City of Dreams.

Lucky Streak(http://www.cityofdreamsmacau.com/gaming/club?utm_source=nsl_1201&utm_medium=edm&utm_campaign=g_Lucky_en)

Grab your chance to win HK$1,000,000 cash and other instant prizes every day!

Be one of our 200 winners in

the Grand Draw on 29 Jan 2012! Don’t miss your chance to be our millionaire!

Welcome Rewards(http://www.cityofdreamsmacau.com/gaming/club?utm_source=nsl_1201&utm_medium=edm&utm_campaign=g_Welcome_en)

Join the City Club to redeem more exclusive gifts!

* Terms and conditions apply

Lucky Express(http://www.cityofdreamsmacau.com/location#tabs-4?utm_source=nsl_1201&utm_medium=edm&utm_campaign=ShuttleBus_en)
